dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4098 IH: Communities of Recovery Reauthorization Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Pettersen (for herself and Mr. Nunn of Iowa) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize grants for building communities of recovery.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Communities of Recovery Reauthorization Act of 2023.

Section 547(f) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 290eeâ€“2(f)) is amended by striking $5,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2019 through 2023 and inserting $16,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2024 through 2028.
